'''Ashere''' was the steed of [[Helm's daughter|Héra]], in the film ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim]]''. He is named after [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Æschere Æschere], a character from ''Beowulf''.<ref name="Art Of" />
